mapper.select: select * from js_question where id not in (SELECT question_id from js_completed where user_id = #{userId}) and status = 0 ORDER BY RAND() limit 1
SELECT a.create_date createTime, q.`name` name, q.score score from js_answer a LEFT JOIN js_question q on q.id = a.question_id where a.user_id = #{userId}

select q.name, q.score, c.num from js_question q LEFT join (SELECT question_id, count(*) as num from js_completed GROUP BY question_id) c on q.id = c.question_id where q.id not in (SELECT question_id from js_completed where user_id = #{userId}) and q.score >= #{low} and q.score <= #{hight}
